title: Will a doctor on demand treat strep throat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Doctors will either do a rapid strep test - if this is positive, they will treat with antibiotics, or they can also follow the guidelines for probability of strep throat and then treat: Sudden onset of sore throat Age 5 to 15 years Fever Headache Nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain Tonsils swollen White exudate Spots on upper palate Tender swollen lymph nodes Presentation in winter or early spring History of exposure to streptococcal pharyngitis

I think that would depend on the doctor’s specialty. A psychiatrist would not, for example. Dermatologist, probably not. But if you were to go to a doc in a box type of place, or an emergency room. They can definitely help you.
